text: Christine Pascal (November 29, 1953 – August 30, 1996) was a French actress and director. She played Sylvie in Round Midnight (1986). She also acted in other movies. Most of those movies were French. Pascal was also a writer. Pascal was born, Lyon, Rhône. She died after jumping from the window of a psychiatric ward near Paris. She was aged 42. title: Christine Pascal
